Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the actions of the Bush administration by stating that they "wrote a check without asking for any conditions of change" in the case of General Motors.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to back up the statement about the actions of the Bush administration.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the Bush administration did have conditions of change for General Motors.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for the actions of the Bush administration in the case of General Motors that are not mentioned in the claim.
